name: Autumn town
description:
Cozy Autumn is about going around your small town, talking to your neighbors, and going to the cafe. The game is inspired by Stardew Valley. 

(I wish I hadn't started 8 days before the jam ended, If I didn't, more animations, houses, npc's, and much more would have been added)

CONTROLS
WASD and arrow keys to move around
To talk or enter a building, click on the person or building
to get out of a chair, click space

Art, music, and code were all made by me

Thank you for playing!
